turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. Yes. Please, I want you to help me order a cup of coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just the normal dark coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the pike roast?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, that is good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whipped cream is what I need with a little honey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, did you want to add any sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. No. No. I'm okay with the honey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering a pike roast with whipped cream and honey, is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the Starbucks at 1500 Broadway Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i will send your order to the location on 1500 broadway street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thank you. Nothing else on that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
